column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Before I go on to the truly fantastic food
column2: I will echo the others and note how exceptionally bad the service is. Like
column3: laughable. I couldn't tell if our server was stoned
column4: or if he actually just didn't give a sh*t whether we enjoyed our meal. Isn't the job market really sucky right now? Can't they hire better people?
